I just voted in the first election in Libya. Congratulation to all free Libyans.
I voted in Libya's first free elections. Congratulations to all the Libyans this holiday, which was given to the sons of martyrs by their sacrifices.
I congratulate the Election Commission, the security men, the election commissions and the Libyan people all on this day.
I met a 95-year-old woman who came to vote and exercise her democratic right for the first time in her life and is very happy today.
I met a 95 year old lady who came to vote for the first time in her life. This made possible by the victim of the martyrs.
Our people come out in record numbers all over the country to show that they are civilized and and proud of their new democracy and freedom.
